name: Me, Myselfs and I
description:
Me, Myselfs and I is a abstract experimental game where you don't control a character

but many characters all at once

They are all you and you are all them

- Control theoretical infinite copies of you all at the same time
- Make extra copies by combining pieces of yourselfs
- Let yourselfs pick up guns and shields to use against ugly monsters
- Direct controls of arms with mouse and keyboard
- Explore the possibilities now that you are many
- Try not to kill yourselfs!

How To Play - Prepare phase:- Monster phase:Grab floating broken pieces from the center hole
Bring out your shields and guns (CTRL) and shootCombine broken pieces to create more selfsDodge fireballs with all yourselfs and/or use shieldsGrab guns and shields with yourselfs
Grab Bombs and throw them in the hole or at the monster

Made In 72 hours for the Ludum Dare game jam:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/me-myselfs-and-i
